project_name: Donald D. Summerville Olympic Pools Improvements

description: The Humber Bay Park Master Plan guides park improvements and maintenance, establishes priorities and informs the budget and decision-making.

description: A new park is coming to Spadina-Fort York as part of a subdivision development at CityPlace.

project_name: Terry Fox Legacy Art Project Toronto
description: The City is partnering with Waterfront Toronto and Legacy Art Project Toronto (LAPT) to add public art commemorating the legacy of Canadian athlete, humanitarian, and activist Terry Fox.
The City is expanding Syd Cole Park by 3,019m2 (similar in size to the existing park) and is developing the park design with the help of community feedback.
The City is improving Anniversary Park with the help of community feedback! The proposed improvements may include additional seating, water bottle filler, and new plantings.

The improvements will be focused near the existing tennis courts and may include a new playground, outdoor fitness equipment, a gathering area with seating, new lighting, wayfinding signs, line painting for games on the parking pad, tennis court resurfacing, water bottle filler and new tree plantings.

As part of the Bathurst Quay Neighbourhood Plan, a multi-phase project to revitalize the Bathurst Quay community, a new approximate 4,000 square metre (1 acre) park is coming to the historic Canada Malting Co. property located at 3 Eireann Quay.
The City is expanding Morrish Parkette by 1,080m2 and is developing the park design with the help of community feedback.
The City is collaborating with the local Church-Wellesley Village community to develop a new vision and Master Plan for Barbara Hall Park.
The City is improving the playground in Lambton Park.
image_alt_text: Photo of the new Lambton Park playground looking northeast. There is armourstone seating, a stand-alone climber, and a senior play structure with a triple slide in the foreground, and a junior play structure with a curved slide visible in the background.

description: The City is improving the tennis clubhouse in Clydesdale Park. The improvements will include general building repairs and the addition of a new accessible washroom.

description: The City is improving access to Toronto Island Park by beginning to replace its ferry fleet with electric vessels, building supporting electrical infrastructure at Jack Layton Ferry Terminal and reviewing all existing operational practices.
